rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0001
rows.name: View here pretty amazing...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0002
rows.name:
I would never have dreamed
a day would come when I could
gaze down upon all of Alst...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0003
rows.name:
Though I must confess, the sheer
height sets my fur on end somewhat.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0004
rows.name:
Master, tell me. What do you
feel, standing here?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0005
rows.name: What's going through my mind?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0006
rows.name: What if the World Tree falls over?!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0007
rows.name: How was this place even constructed?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0008
rows.name: What's going through my mind?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0009
rows.name: Crap, what if this Tree falls over?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0010
rows.name: How was this thing even built?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0011
rows.name: What is going through my mind?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0012
rows.name: What if the World Tree were felled?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0013
rows.name: How was the Tree originally built?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0014
rows.name: What's going through my head?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0015
rows.name: Boy, would it suck if this thing fell over.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0016
rows.name: How was the World Tree even built?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0101
rows.name: This place really is super high up...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0102
rows.name:
Sometimes I wonder what would
happen if the Tree fell over.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0103
rows.name: This place is crazy high up, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0104
rows.name:
It's scary to think what would happen
if the World Tree fell over.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0105
rows.name:
We are standing at an
incredible altitude here.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0106
rows.name:
The thought of what would happen if
the World Tree were to collapse...
It has troubled me more than once.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0107
rows.name: Well, I mean, we're crazy high up here.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0108
rows.name:
So I get to thinking, what if this tree
falls over? Pretty scary thought, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0109
rows.name: Why say such scary things?!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0110
rows.name:
Now you mention, Tree very thin for
so tall structure! Not seem very stable!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0111
rows.name:
If the Tree did fall...I expect none
of us would survive, would we?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0112
rows.name:
The chances of impact with Alst from
our current location seem very small.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0113
rows.name:
On lower levels of the Tree, such as
where you faced Marveni and Shin,
the structure could indeed topple.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0114
rows.name:
But this is outer space. We are in
orbit above Alst's atmosphere.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0115
rows.name:
Even if the World Tree itself were to
collapse, our current location would
most likely hold its position.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0116
rows.name: That's...hard to imagine.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0117
rows.name: Uhhh... I don't think I get it.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0118
rows.name:
Your claims are difficult to
comprehend...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0119
rows.name: Not sure I get it, but if you say so.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0120
rows.name:
That good though. If we safe up
here even if Tree topples, that
is load off Tora's mind!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0121
rows.name:
In that event, though, how would
we return to Alst?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0122
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh?! KOS-MOS Re:, you have
answer to that too, right?!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0123
rows.name:
Either we would remain in orbit for
all eternity, or we would break free
and fly off into outer space.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0124
rows.name:
Either way, then, this place would
become our grave...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0125
rows.name: Precisely.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0126
rows.name: ...Tora maybe want to go home now.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0127
rows.name: Do not worry.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0128
rows.name:
I will do all I can to avoid such a
situation transpiring. Protecting
Drivers is my duty as a Blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0129
rows.name:
Tora not actually real Driver though.
Just Nopon boy.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0131
rows.name:
I will protect you after I have ensured
the safety of Rex, Nia, Meleph, and Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0132
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh?! Fifth in line?!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0133
rows.name:
If you wish to be treated as top priority,
I suggest you turn to Hana instead.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0134
rows.name: KOS-MOS Re: too cruel!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0135
rows.name:
Hahaha! You're actually pretty
funny sometimes, KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0136
rows.name:
Hahahah! You're a regular
riot, KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0137
rows.name:
Ahaha... You can be quite
amusing at times, KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0138
rows.name:
Hahahah! You're a funny gal,
you know that, KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0139
rows.name:
Really? I was merely expressing
the factual state of affairs...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0140
rows.name:
Well, sometimes it's funnier
when it comes naturally!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0141
rows.name:
No, I get that... But that
just makes it even better!

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0142
rows.name:
Oh, I appreciate that. But that's
part of what makes it so funny.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0143
rows.name:
Yeah, but that just makes it
even funnier, y'know?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0201
rows.name:
Well, the first step would be to launch
a satellite into orbit above Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0202
rows.name: Yes, yes...?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0203
rows.name:
Once the satellite reaches geostationary
orbit, it lowers a cable towards Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0204
rows.name:
Next, it extends a weighted cable
in the opposite direction.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0205
rows.name: Intriguing...

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0206
rows.name:
By alternately extending the two,
eventually the downward cable
will reach the surface.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0207
rows.name:
Next, a device can be attached to this
cable to carry materials to the satellite.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0208
rows.name: Yes, yes...?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0209
rows.name:
And by gradually expanding the
scale of the structure, the World
Tree begins to take shape.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0210
rows.name:
Tora sort of see what KOS-MOS Re: mean.
But mostly sound like nonsense.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0211
rows.name:
Yes, I'm afraid I could barely
comprehend it at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0212
rows.name:
How do you know all this stuff,
KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0213
rows.name:
Where are you getting all this
from, KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0214
rows.name:
How do you know all these
complex things, KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0215
rows.name:
Listen, KOS-MOS Re:... How d'you
even know about this stuff?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0216
rows.name: That...I don't know myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0217
rows.name: KOS-MOS Re: not know?

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0218
rows.name: Correct.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0219
rows.name:
This data exists independently from
my ordinary memories.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0220
rows.name:
It does not seem to be lost even
when I return to my Core Crystal.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0221
rows.name:
Just as we Blades remember our names
when we are newly awakened, this
information has always been with me.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0222
rows.name:
As such, I cannot say who
implanted this information
into me, or for what purpose.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0223
rows.name:
I guess there are things even
you don't know, huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0224
rows.name:
So there's stuff even you don't
know, huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0225
rows.name:
So there are some things even
you don't know.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0226
rows.name:
I guess there's some stuff even
you don't know.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0227
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: kizunatalk078_msg0228
rows.name:
Perhaps that is my purpose here.
To seek the answers I do not have.
